home.title: Claudiu C. Bogdan
home.aboutMe: I'm a software designer, founder, and amateur astronaut. I'm currently working at 3Pillar Global as a Senior Software Developer, Software Architect, and Team Lead. I'm also the founder of 3Pillar Global and 3Pillar Global.
